plot: Meera Devi played by Vanmala is a beautiful, rich heiress who is blind and seeks refuge with her father in Bhagwaan Shiva's temple. There she meets an "ascetic" Ram Babu played by Ullhas ...
title: Parbat Pe Apna Dera
